00197 
00201 enum L4_irq_op
00202 {
00203   L4_IRQ_OP_ATTACH    = 1,
00204   L4_IRQ_OP_TRIGGER   = 2,
00205   L4_IRQ_OP_CHAIN     = 3,
00206   L4_IRQ_OP_EOI       = 4,
00207 };
00208 
00209 /**************************************************************************
00210  * Implementations
00211  */
00212 
00213 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00214 l4_irq_attach_u(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_umword_t label,
00215                 l4_cap_idx_t thread, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00216 {
00217   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00218   m->mr[0] = L4_IRQ_OP_ATTACH;
00219   m->mr[1] = label;
00220   m->mr[2] = l4_map_obj_control(0, 0);
00221   m->mr[3] = l4_obj_fpage(thread, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00222   return l4_ipc_call(irq, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 1, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00223 }
00224 
00225 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00226 l4_irq_chain_u(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_umword_t label,
00227                l4_cap_idx_t slave, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00228 {
00229   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00230   m->mr[0] = L4_IRQ_OP_CHAIN;
00231   m->mr[1] = label;
00232   m->mr[2] = l4_map_obj_control(0, 0);
00233   m->mr[3] = l4_obj_fpage(slave, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00234   return l4_ipc_call(irq, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 1, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00235 }
00236 
00237 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00238 l4_irq_detach_u(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00239 {
00240   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_IRQ_OP_ATTACH;
00241   return l4_ipc_call(irq, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 1, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00242 }
00243 
00244 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00245 l4_irq_trigger_u(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00246 {
00247   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_IRQ_OP_TRIGGER;
00248   return l4_ipc_send(irq, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 1, 0, 0),
00249                      L4_IPC_BOTH_TIMEOUT_0);
00250 }
00251 
00252 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00253 l4_irq_receive_u(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_timeout_t to, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00254 {
00255   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_IRQ_OP_EOI;
00256   return l4_ipc_call(irq, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 1, 0, 0), to);
00257 }
00258 
00259 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00260 l4_irq_wait_u(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_umword_t *label,
00261             l4_timeout_t to, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00262 {
00263   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_IRQ_OP_EOI;
00264   return l4_ipc_send_and_wait(irq, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 1, 0, 0),
00265                               label, to);
00266 }
00267 
00268 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00269 l4_irq_unmask_u(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00270 {
00271   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_IRQ_OP_EOI;
00272   return l4_ipc_send(irq, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 1, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00273 }
00274 
00275 
00276 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00277 l4_irq_attach(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_umword_t label,
00278               l4_cap_idx_t thread) L4_NOTHROW
00279 {
00280   return l4_irq_attach_u(irq, label, thread, l4_utcb());
00281 }
00282 
00283 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00284 l4_irq_chain(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_umword_t label,
00285              l4_cap_idx_t slave) L4_NOTHROW
00286 {
00287   return l4_irq_chain_u(irq, label, slave, l4_utcb());
00288 }
00289 
00290 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00291 l4_irq_detach(l4_cap_idx_t irq) L4_NOTHROW
00292 {
00293   return l4_irq_detach_u(irq, l4_utcb());
00294 }
00295 
00296 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00297 l4_irq_trigger(l4_cap_idx_t irq) L4_NOTHROW
00298 {
00299   return l4_irq_trigger_u(irq, l4_utcb());
00300 }
00301 
00302 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00303 l4_irq_receive(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_timeout_t to) L4_NOTHROW
00304 {
00305   return l4_irq_receive_u(irq, to, l4_utcb());
00306 }
00307 
00308 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00309 l4_irq_wait(l4_cap_idx_t irq, l4_umword_t *label,
00310             l4_timeout_t to) L4_NOTHROW
00311 {
00312   return l4_irq_wait_u(irq, label, to, l4_utcb());
00313 }

00315 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00316 l4_irq_unmask(l4_cap_idx_t irq) L4_NOTHROW
00317 {
00318   return l4_irq_unmask_u(irq, l4_utcb());
